text: Veronika Domjan (born 3 September 1996) is a Slovenian athlete specialising in the discus throw. She won the silver medal at the 2015 European Junior Championships. Her personal best in the event is 60.11 metres set in Amsterdam in 2016. title: Veronika Domjan
